name: Sleepy Bunny and the Midnight Lights
name_original: Sleepy Bunny and the Midnight Lights
description:
Synopsis:

Toys are the ones that protect our children from the monsters at night when we sleep. Follow Sleepy Bunny she traverses through a solemn world in search for her  lost owner. 

First Build of the game of my first 3D game.

Extremely buggy.
